roleset.name: in the stage after a trauma has been suffered

roles.note: Rel may be hyphenated, single-token, or require concatenation.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-seedcorpus.

example.name: concetenated rel
example.text: Soft tissue calcification anterior to the tibial spine at the lower calf level may be post traumatic .
example.arg: Soft tissue calcification anterior to the tibial spine at the lower calf level
